articles.author: Bryan Mena
articles.title: Americans likely rushed to shop in March ahead of Trump’s tariffs, but economists say that boost won’t last - CNN
articles.description: Spending at US retailers skyrocketed last month at the strongest monthly pace in [more than two years/nearly a year] as Americans rushed to beat President Donald Trump’s massive tariff hikes.
articles.content:
Spending at US retailers skyrocketed last month at the strongest monthly pace in more than two years as Americans rushed to beat President Donald Trumps massive tariff hikes.
Retail sales climbed 1.… [+1116 chars]
